DOC.brief_summary: This is a study of the expression of nogo and reticulon genes in the skeletal muscle of patients with amyotrophic lateral sclerosis (ALS).
DOC.brief_title: A Study of the Expression of Nogo and Reticulon Genes in Skeletal Muscle of Patients With Amyotrophic Lateral Sclerosis
DOC.criteria: Patients with definite ALS Males or females Age > 18 Patients with other neuromuscular affections
